Meet Our Mayor and Councilors

The Junction City Council meets on the second Tuesday at 6:30 p.m. and often on the 4th Tuesday for a Council Work Session. The meetings are held in the City Hall Council Chambers at 680 Greenwood Street, Junction City Oregon 97448.

The City Council is the legislative branch of our local government. The Council adopts laws called ordinances, sets policies, adopts the budget, levies taxes, and conducts public meetings.
